dublin_core.dcvalue: Freya Paleit, Global Media Manager, Sightsavers, Email: fpaleit@sightsavers.org | Iain Jones, Economic Adviser Health Services Team, DFID, Email: jones@dfid.gov.uk

Prevalence data are collected on smartphones using a mapping platform that allows for GPS readings to be linked to households surveyed administered by trained survey teams. The platform enables partners, MOH and stakeholders to tailor trachoma elimination programs. Over 1 million people in 6 countries have been checked for Trachoma as of September 2013.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:57Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 global_trachoma_mapping_project.pdf: 270469 bytes, checksum: ce5803d2fe7e97a6a796ba3750a58d4b (MD5)
